personalInfo.name: Akshat Thakkar
personalInfo.title: Software Developer | ML & Data Analyst | Full Stack Developer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A passionate and skilled software developer proficient in full-stack development, machine learning, and data analysis.

faqs.question: What are my key skills?
faqs.answer: I'm proficient in full-stack development using technologies like React.js, FastAPI, Java, Python, and databases such as MySQL and MongoDB.  My data analysis skills include using Python libraries (Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn) and tools like Power BI and Tableau. I also have experience in machine learning using scikit-learn.

faqs.question: What kind of projects have I worked on?
faqs.answer: I've developed a state-city-wise news portal using the FARM stack, analyzed Lok Sabha election data to study voting trends, built a fake news detection model, and created an e-waste facility locator app.  I also have experience building CRUD applications.

faqs.question: What are my career goals?
faqs.answer: I'm seeking a challenging role where I can leverage my skills in full-stack development, machine learning, and data analysis to contribute to innovative projects and solve real-world problems.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.subtitle: My professional journey and the skills I've acquired along the way

description: Developed StateBuzz, a state-city-wise news portal using the FARM stack (FastAPI, ReactJS, MongoDB).
Built modules for auth, role-based dashboards, news posting, and comments.
Integrated Cloudinary for image uploads and added email alerts (signup, approval, reset).
Gained hands-on experience with REST APIs, React components, and FastAPI routing.
Analyzed Lok Sabha data (2004-2024) to study voting trends, turnout, and party performance.
Applied statistical methods and hypothesis testing for deeper insights.
Utilized Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn) for data preprocessing and visual exploration.
Created interactive Power BI dashboards to present findings.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my skills and creativity.

items.title: StateBuzz News Portal
items.description: A state-city-wise news portal built using the FARM stack.
items.longDescription: Developed a full-stack news portal using FastAPI, ReactJS, and MongoDB.  Included features like user authentication, role-based dashboards, news posting, comments, image uploads (Cloudinary), and email alerts.

items.title: Lok Sabha Data Analysis
items.description: Analysis of Lok Sabha election data (2004-2024).
items.longDescription: Analyzed Lok Sabha data to study voting trends, turnout, and party performance.  Utilized Python libraries (Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn) for data preprocessing and visualization, and created interactive Power BI dashboards.

items.title: Fake News Detection
items.description: Machine learning model for fake news detection.
items.longDescription: Built an ML pipeline using TF-IDF vectorization and Logistic Regression to classify news as fake or real. Included text cleaning, stemming, NLP, and label preprocessing.  Created an interactive web app using Gradio for real-time predictions.

items.title: E-Waste Facility Locator
items.description: ReactJS application to locate e-waste disposal facilities.
items.longDescription: Developed a ReactJS application to help users find nearby e-waste disposal facilities. Integrated Google Maps links and included educational videos on proper e-waste disposal.

items.title: CRUD Application
items.description: Java, JSP, and MySQL based CRUD application for student records.
items.longDescription: Built a secure CRUD application using Java, JSP, and MySQL for managing student records.  Included features like registration and session-based logout.
